summary: Project to refine webpage section layout/styling (spacing and dividers).

existing_features.title: In the selected Gallery section header (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]), increase the vertical spacing between the heading and the subheading so it visually matches the spacing used between the heading and subheading in the last sectionâ€™s header (Contact section).
At the end of the selected Gallery section (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]), add a visual divider line that clearly separates it from the next section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Section 1: increase spacing between heading and subheading to match Section 5.
Section 2: add a visual divider at the end of the section.

projectName: Adjust Gallery section header spacing and add end-of-section divider
